Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, north of the Guard Barracks.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Central City Guard Barracks are located to the south of Rosecrest Street. The wide entrance itself is guarded by two burly looking guards. The Barracks are designed to be the recreational area and living quarters for the guards who protect the city from thugs and hooligans.
